channel.title: Help downloading hamachi!
channel.description: well ok heres the deal i go to download hamachi and i get it downloaded and everything so then i click on the short cut so i can get started and it says there is a newer version would u like to update(even though i download the newest version)and everytime i get done downloading the update it just shuts down and keeps doing that over and over again plz help........ :confused:

item.title: Help downloading hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“applesnider, post:1, topic:10349”]well ok heres the deal i go to download hamachi and i get it downloaded and everything so then i click on the short cut so i can get started and it says there is a newer version would u like to update(even though i download the newest version)and everytime i get done downloading the update it just shuts down and keeps doing that over and over again plz help… [/quote] startmenu-------->all programs------->Hamachi------------->
Tjhe 1 that goes onto youre desktop will always want to update and then shutdown. You need the 1 on the startmenu.

Read full topic
